Experience

Turaco Treetops Lodge is a luxury lodge set in the lush rainforest neighbouring Uganda’s Kibale National Park.
With uninterrupted views over the snow-capped Rwenzori Mountains & Kibale Forest, Turaco Treetops Lodge is the ideal place to immerse yourself in nature & experience an Uganda safari of note.
Turaco’s location sets a precedent for wonderful chimpanzee encounters, with a 90% success rate of seeing the primate up close in Kibale Forest National Park. Other animals that can be seen include bush babies, black & white colobus monkeys & the great blue turaco bird.

Stay

Constructed on stilts, Turaco’s 8 luxury forest cottages are set deep within the forest, hidden between the Kibale treetops.
These upscale treehouse-styled cottages include en-suite bathrooms & private viewing decks with breathtaking views over the forest. This is the ideal spot to relax on a sun lounger & watch as the monkeys & birds play in the greenery.
The main building features a bar, a wood-burning fireplace for chilly winter evenings & a cosy elevated lounge boasting incredible views of the surrounding landscape.
There is also a large swimming pool as well as an indoor & outdoor children’s play area.

Activities

Guests staying at Turaco Treetops Lodge can explore the rainforest on foot, go on a birding tour or view the volcanic-induced crater lakes via hiking or mountain biking.

subfolders.title: Ndali Lodge
subfolders.description: Ndali Lodge is perched on the edge of an extinct volcano, which over centuries has been filled with water to become the vast Lake Nyinambuga in the Bunyaruguru Crater Field in Uganda. This rustic & intimate lodge prides itself on its relaxed & friendly atmosphere, ensuring that its guests feel right at home throughout their stay.  The staff are locals who come from nearby villages & have been professionally trained to ensure excellent service.

subfolders.title: Papaya Lake Lodge
subfolders.description: The intimate & peaceful Papaya Lake Lodge is located close to Kibale National Park & Queen Elizabeth Park, where exhilarating chimpanzee treks & sights of the red colobus monkey can be enjoyed. Papaya Lake Lodge offers sweeping views of Lyantonde & Kifuruka Lakes within Uganda’s Great Crater Lakes region.
